page.title: 12DAY IN BOY'S LIFE,NESSCLIFFE
page.content: I woke up and had Cornflakes for breakfast. I got dressed and went out to play on my bike. I went to school by car. I read and then I go into the hall for hymns. Then we do work . At half past ten we go out to play, some of us play football. We come back to do more work. At l2.OO we have dinner in the hall. Some people have sandwiches. Then we play outside again. We start afternoon school at lpm and go home at 3.15pm. When I get home I play with my brother. I had my tea at 6 o'clock. Then I went outside and played. I watched TV and went to bed at 9pm.
